definition: idea/opinion/meaning/wish/desire/interest/fun/token of appreciation, affection etc/CL:個|个[ge4]/to give as a small token/to do sth as a gesture of goodwill etc
Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]
to feel embarrassed/to find it embarrassing/to be sorry (for inconveniencing sb)
to have the nerve/what a cheek!/to feel no shame/to overcome the shame/(is it) proper? (rhetorical question)
small token/mere trifle (used of one's gifts)

sentences.english: I believed that the mixture of religion and politics was dangerous.
sentences.chinese: 意思是說政教合一是非常危險的。

sentences.english: "Well, it isn't as interesting, " said Hurstwood.
sentences.chinese: “哎，也不如芝加哥有意思，”赫斯渥說。

sentences.english: One example is "One word weighs nine Dings".
sentences.chinese: 字面意思呢就是說一句話抵得上九隻鼎。

sentences.english: A little down? Do you mean move it down to the left?
sentences.chinese: 有點往下？你的意思是說把它往左邊移下一點。

sentences.english: R. C. – Of discourse, of the body, that is what I mean.
sentences.chinese: 關於論述，關於身體，那是我的意思。

sentences.english: The social effect of an evening of one-on-one theatre is interesting.
sentences.chinese: 這一夜一對一劇場的社會反響很有意思。

sentences.english: It was a very interesting project. I really enjoyed working on it.
sentences.chinese: 這個項目很有意思，我很喜歡幹。
它有27個字母，意思類似於“充滿了榮耀”。

sentences.english: If you get what I mean.
To learn about the Wolong Panda Reserve was really interesting.
sentences.chinese: 瞭解到臥龍熊貓保護區的情況真有意思。

sentences.english: I mean , he is the king of idiots.
sentences.chinese: 我的老闆真是愚蠢，我的意思是他是個大白癡。

sentences.english: That meant political troublemakers who did not have a lot of support.
sentences.chinese: 其意思是少有支持者的政壇搗亂分子。

sentences.english: By the end of the chapter, you'll have guessed the meaning of this word.
sentences.chinese: 等您讀完這一章時，您就會猜出這個詞的意思了。

sentences.english: Look up the dictionary and explain the meaning of the italicized words.
sentences.chinese: 查字典然後解釋斜體詞的意思。

sentences.english: The etymological meaning of both words is “something added on.”
sentences.chinese: 從詞源學的角度來看，兩個詞都有“附加物”的意思。

sentences.english: “There’s no question that Dr. Kearns’ wiper circuit was interesting, ” Daykin says.
sentences.chinese: 毫無疑問，卡恩斯博士的雨刷電路是非常有意思的。

definition: meaning (implicit in a phrase)/implied meaning/hidden meaning/hint/connotation
unspoken implication (idiom)/the actual meaning of what was said
unspoken dialogue in a play, left for the audience to infer/subtext/(fig.) implicit assertion
modal particle indicating that sth is obvious/particle indicating a pause for emphasis
word (general term including monosyllables through to short phrases)/term (e.g. technical term)/expression
the meaning of sth/an explanation of the meaning of words or phrases/definition/an interpretation (of doctrine)/religious doctrine
